mapper.insert: insert into sys_log(id, create_time, create_user_id, last_update_time, last_update_user_id, biz_name, log_type, module_name, raw_data, target_data) value ( #{sysLog.id}, #{sysLog.createDatetime}, #{sysLog.createUserId}, #{sysLog.lastUpdateDatetime}, #{sysLog.lastUpdateUserId}, #{sysLog.bizName}, #{sysLog.logType}, #{sysLog.moduleName}, #{sysLog.rawData}, #{sysLog.targetData})
